question: The circular measure of an angle of an isoceles triangle is 5π/9. Circular measure of one of the other angles must be
explanation:
Sum of remaining two angles = $latex \\pi -\\frac{5\\pi }{9}=\\frac{4\\pi}{9}&s=1$
∴ Each angle = $latex \\frac{1}{2}\\times \\frac{4\\pi }{9}=\\frac{2\\pi }{9}&s=1$
Hence option [B] is the right answer.
